trends: There have been 12 other sightings in St John
There was one other sighting in St John on or around August 7th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas looking out my window at 11:50 pm and saw a bright light moving slow in a straight line going north and recorded it with my handy cam, i used my photo commander 7 program and brought a shape out of the orb from the video and added it to this video as a description of what it is. was sitting looking at the stars and noticed an object slowing moving without any flashing lights in a straight line and thought it was strange, kind od surprised to see another one and recorded it., lost site of it as it went over my house and lost site.
Summary: looked at the night sky from my window and saw a bright object slowly going across the sky at 11:50 pm and recorded it
